event.title: stood apart from any city, most of Progress now

data.event: Originally an unincorporated community that stood apart from any city, most of Progress now lies within the city limits of either Tigard or Beaverton.
Today, Scholls Ferry Road forms much of the boundary between Tigard and Beaverton.
With the opening of the Westside Express Service (WES) commuter-rail service in February 2009, passenger service returned to these tracks, in weekday peak periods only.
